body_html:
I have a similar problem. Python crashed due to following test code:

import torch as t
a = t.tensor([1,2,3,4])
a.sum()

A crash dialog pops up and reports that caffe2.dll has problem.

My environment is:

  • Win7 64bit
  • Python 3.6
  • Pytorch 0.4.1+cuda 9.2
  • Nvidia Geforce 940M, driver version 398.82, Driver Dll Version 9.20(24.21.13.9882), Runtime Dll Version 6.50.
  • Intel Pentium (Support MMX, SSE, SSE2, SSE3, SSE4.1, SSE4.2, EM64T, VT-x)

Can anyone help me? Thanks!

body:
I have a similar problem. Python crashed due to following test code:
```
import torch as t
a = t.tensor([1,2,3,4])
a.sum()
```
A crash dialog pops up and reports that caffe2.dll has problem.

My environment is:

- Win7 64bit
- Python 3.6
- Pytorch 0.4.1+cuda 9.2
- Nvidia Geforce 940M, driver version 398.82, Driver Dll Version 9.20(24.21.13.9882), Runtime Dll Version 6.50.
- Intel Pentium (Support MMX, SSE, SSE2, SSE3, SSE4.1, SSE4.2, EM64T, VT-x)

Can anyone help me? Thanks!
